submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        M = 10**9+7
        curr = [0]*51
        for i in range(nums[0]+1):
            curr[i] = 1
        prev = [0]*51
        for i in range(1,n):
            prev = curr
            curr = [0]*51
            m = min(0,nums[i-1]-nums[i])
            x = 0
            k = 0
            for j in range(-m,nums[i]+1):
                x+=prev[k]
                x%=M
                k+=1
                curr[j]=x
        return sum(curr)%M
